title: Acer Nitro 27" WQHD 2560 x 1440 PC Gaming Monitor | AMD FreeSync Premium | Up to 240Hz Refresh | Up to 0.5ms HDR350 | DCI-P3 90% | 1 x Display Port 1.4 & 2 x HDMI 2.1 | KG271U Xbmiipx
description: In competitive gaming, every frame matters. Introducing Acer's Nitro KG271U gaming monitor - the WQHD resolution monitor that can keep up with your game play. Through AMD FreeSync Premium technology, the game’s frame rate is determined by your graphics card, not the fixed refresh rate of the monitor, giving you a serious competitive edge. Plus, users can enjoy comfortable viewing experience while gaming via flicker-less, low dimming and ComfyView display. The design saves space on your desk and lets you place multiple monitors side by side to build a seamless big-screen display. (UM.HX1AA.X01).
